Talk1077:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>I hope this weather doesn't hamper our
search for the <clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff>...
Talk1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry>That's why I said we should go and seek
out the legendary weapon!
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry_01>No, no! Go to any <clr:0000>stable<clr:ffff> in Hyrule and
you'll find people excited about the
<clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff>!
Stables are <clr:0000>places where information
gathers<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0> If it weren't true, you wouldn't
hear about it at so many stables!
Talk1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>A "legendary weapon," on the other hand,
is bound to be strong indeed. We would
have nothing to fear of monsters.
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>And what if this weapon is legendarily
brittle and useless? Hm?

Let's start <clr:0000>visiting stables <clr:ffff>to gather
information and track down that
<clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff>!
Talk1034:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry>First we go to the <clr:0000>Lost Woods in the
north<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:0:0> We seek out the <clr:0000>legendary sword<clr:ffff>!
Talk1070:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Sleep>What if it's...<sp:5:0:0>legendarily...<sp:5:0:0>brittle?<sp:0:4:0>Let's start...<sp:5:0:0><clr:0000>visiting stables<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0>to learn about the
<clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0>tomorrow...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk1071:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Sleep>No...<sp:5:0:0> First we go to <clr:0000>the Lost Woods in the north<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0>
to find...<sp:5:0:0>the <clr:0000>legendary sword<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk1072: <sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Sleep>No...<sp:5:0:0> First we have to get the...<sp:5:0:0>legendary weapon...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Tired_01>A <clr:0000>legendary sword<clr:ffff>, you say...<sp:5:1:0> Onya,
give that a little more thought.

Things with "legendary" in the title are
usually just stories. There's simply no way
it exists!
Talk1074:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Have you heard about the <clr:0000>rumor about
the beast<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:0:0><sp:5:0:0> Actually...<sp:5:0:0>forget I said
anything.
Talk1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>A <clr:0000>legendary sword<clr:ffff>, on the other hand,
is bound to be strong indeed. We would
have nothing to fear of monsters.
It's <clr:0000>in the Lost Woods<clr:ffff>, I hear,<sp:5:0:0> so let's
start heading that way!
Talk1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:QuestionNormal_00>But that <clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff> you're after,
that's what's just a story!
Talk1076:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>Tomorrow, I'll persuade Onya to search
for the <clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff>...
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Tired_01>A legendary weapon, you say...<sp:5:1:0> Onya,
give that a little more thought.

Things with "legendary" in the title are
usually just stories. There's simply no way
it exists!
Talk1018:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:TalkPositive_01>Even if I grant you that, we don't
stand to gain anything by finding this
<clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff>!
